lines.text:
[the act quits, to Buster and Fatty]
We don't need them. Let's do the show ourselves!

[the novelty dancer is heckling their act]
Cut that out or we'll throw you out!

[During the Snowflake Serenade, Buster's wiping sweat off]
It's supposed to be winter - shiver!

[Introducing the show]
Fellas, the first act is The Fallin' Reign. It's got pretty girls and lotsa dancin'!

[Introducing Next Act]
Ladies, here's some singin' and romance for ya.
